p: The plugin MMQGIS of the software QGIS 2.8.2-Wien was used to geocode the dengue cases using data on residence address. This plugin uses Google Maps ™ API to geocode the addresses, and the result is a point shapefile. The shape of a map presenting the limits of the districts from the site Geoweb Vitória ( www.geoweb.vitoria.es.gov.br) was used to check the position of the cases geocoded.
